description: Enterprise techniques used by GLOOXMAIL, ATT&CK software S0026 (v1.2)
name: GLOOXMAIL (S0026)

techniques.comment: [GLOOXMAIL](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0026) communicates to servers operated by Google using the Jabber/XMPP protocol for C2.(Citation: Mandiant APT1 Appendix)
[GLOOXMAIL](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0026) communicates to servers operated by Google using the Jabber/XMPP protocol.(Citation: Mandiant APT1)(Citation: CyberESI GTALK)
